pageContext.collection_title: Field recordings of orchestras and ensembles
pageContext.collection_description: Field recordings of mostly local orchestras and ensembles as well as those of visiting soloists and ensembles.
collectionFormats: Optical disc (including CD, CD-R, CD-RW, DVD, DVD-R, DVD-RW, VCD)
pageContext.collection_notes: VHS tapes include both SVHS tapes and Digital (PCM) recordings on VHS
